articles.title: DNA Explainer: What is Guillain Barre Syndrome that some COVID-19 patients are developing? - DNA India
articles.description: GBS is a rare disorder in which your body's immune system attacks your nerves. Weakness and tingling in your extremities are usually the first symptoms.
